reviews.review_msg: Hands down the best professor I have ever had! She is the most caring individual, who genuinely wants her students to learn and enjoy the class. I look forward to the class every week and doing assignments don't even feel like work because I weirdly enough enjoy doing them. I am so sad that she is leaving SFU because she is seriously the best!!

Honestly the best professor I've ever had in any course. Guldana prioritizes engagement and students actually learning, rather than emphasizing grades. As a result, she's a very fair marker and aims to make sure her students get good grades! Truly heartbroken she will not be staying at SFU, professors will her kindness and passion are rare

I took Guldana's class without knowing anything about her or the topics. I am so glad I took her class and left the semester feeling inspired to learn more. She is very understanding and has a real passion for the topics she is teaching. She is not an overly hard marker and gives plenty of opportunities to succeed. Wish she was staying at SFU!
